self.title: CDISC Questionnaire Q-LES-Q Test Name Terminology

definition: Quality Of Life Enjoyment And Satisfaction Questionnaire test name.
name: Quality Of Life Enjoyment And Satisfaction Questionnaire Test Name
preferredTerm: CDISC Questionnaire Q-LES-Q Test Name Terminology
synonyms: Quality Of Life Enjoyment And Satisfaction Questionnaire Test Name

terms.definition: Quality Of Life Enjoyment And Satisfaction Questionnaire - Taking everything into consideration, during the past week how satisfied have you been with your: Ability to function in daily life?
terms.preferredTerm: Q-LES-Q - Ability to Function in Daily Life
terms.submissionValue: QLES1-Ability to Function in Daily Life
synonyms: QLES1-Ability to Function in Daily Life

terms.definition: Quality Of Life Enjoyment And Satisfaction Questionnaire - Taking everything into consideration, during the past week how satisfied have you been with your: Ability to get around physically without feeling dizzy or unsteady or falling?
terms.preferredTerm: Q-LES-Q - Ability to Get Around Physically

terms.definition: Quality Of Life Enjoyment And Satisfaction Questionnaire - During the past week how much of the time have you: Felt able to communicate with others?
terms.preferredTerm: Q-LES-Q - Able to Communicate With Others

terms.definition: Quality Of Life Enjoyment And Satisfaction Questionnaire - During the past week how much of the time have you: Felt able to deal with life's problems?

terms.definition: Quality Of Life Enjoyment And Satisfaction Questionnaire - During the past week how much of the time have you: Felt able to travel about to get things done when needed (walk, use car, bus, train, or whatever is available as needed)?

terms.submissionValue: QLES1-Able to Travel About When Needed
